tool_description: Analyzes user posting patterns, review history, and behavioral characteristics to identify suspicious account activity and potential policy violations.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user to analyze

recent_review_timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for user's recent reviews

review_ratings.description: Array of ratings given by the user in recent reviews

account_creation_date.description: Date when the user account was created

total_reviews_posted.description: Total number of reviews posted by this user

verified_purchases.description: Number of reviews from verified purchases

product_categories.description: Product categories the user has reviewed

average_review_length.description: Average length of user's reviews in characters

check_posting_velocity.description: Whether to analyze posting frequency patterns

check_rating_patterns.description: Whether to analyze unusual rating patterns

check_category_diversity.description: Whether to analyze diversity of reviewed product categories

error_messages: Invalid user data: user_id cannot be empty and numeric fields must be non-negative
Mismatched array lengths: recent_review_timestamps and review_ratings must have the same length
Invalid timestamps: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 format
Invalid account creation date: Must be valid ISO 8601 format and in the past
Invalid rating values: All ratings must be between 1 and 5
Too many reviews: Maximum 50 recent reviews allowed for analysis
usage: Provide user ID and comprehensive behavioral data including review history, timestamps, and account information. Enable various analysis checks to customize behavioral risk assessment.

behavior_risk_score.description: Overall behavioral risk score (0-1, higher means more suspicious)

suspicious_patterns.description: List of suspicious behavioral patterns detected

account_trustworthiness.description: Overall account assessment: trustworthy, questionable, suspicious

analysis_summary.description: Summary of key behavioral analysis findings
